name: 李俊賢
objective: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Matlab Tutorial (Ch. 1)
Week 3: Simulink: Quick Start (Ch. 2)
Week 4: Simulink: Modeling (Ch. 3)
Week 5: Simulink: Simulation & Analysis (Ch. 4-6)
Week 6: Dynamic Systems Modeling (Ch. 7)
Week 7: Time-Domain Analysis (Ch. 8)
Week 8: Root Locus Analysis (Ch. 8)
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Frequency-Domain Analysis (Ch. 9)
Week 11: PID Controller Design (Ch. 10)
Week 12: Lag-Lead Compensator Design (Ch. 10)
Week 13: Case Studies (1/3)
Week 14: Case Studies (2/3)
Week 15: Case Studies (3/3)
Week 16: Special Topics (1/2)
Week 17: Special Topics (2/2)
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy: 實習操作與報告：70%、上機考試：20%、出席：10%
materials: Textbook: 李宜達編著，控制系統設計與模擬：使用MATLAB/SIMULINK (修訂六版)，全華圖書、2009。
